title: macbook air 820-0165-a long boot and no wake up
message:
hello everyone,
I have a macbook air 820-0165-a which take a long time to boot (2min).
Its hard to prompt to boot.
When the mac finally boot up it work perfectly no lags.
The other issue is when you close the mac and open it to leave sleep mode, wake up fail and reboot the mac.
Any idea ?

[ATTACH type="full"]59542[/ATTACH]
[ATTACH type="full"]59541[/ATTACH]
[ATTACH type="full"]59543[/ATTACH]

title: macbook air 820-0165-a long boot and no wake up
message:
You can have an iGPU problem.
Run Unigine Heavem to stress Intel graphics.

Is worth to try clean ME BIOS.

title: macbook air 820-0165-a long boot and no wake up
message:
Thx a lot. It was an issue with ME region. I cleaned the Me region and now everything work perfectly.
Thanks
